data.scientific_title: Patterns of care in patients with pancreatic cancer.
data.simplified_title: Patterns of care in patients with pancreatic cancer.
data.source_system: This project will describe the treatment patterns of patients with pancreatic cancer throughout NSW and QLD.  A quality of care score will be developed, and the care of patients in this cohort benchmarked against the score. The impact of patient characteristics on the quality of care provided will be assessed, as will the impact of quality of care on survival. The ultimate aim is to provide information that can be used to ensure that all patients in Australia receive optimal care.
